permissions.name: Create Jobs
permissions.description: Permission to create and post new job listings

permissions.name: View Jobs
permissions.description: Permission to view all job listings and details

permissions.name: Edit Jobs
permissions.description: Permission to modify existing job postings

permissions.name: Delete Jobs
permissions.description: Permission to remove job listings from the system

permissions.name: Manage Candidates
permissions.description: Permission to add, edit, and manage candidate profiles

permissions.name: View Candidates
permissions.description: Permission to view candidate profiles and information

permissions.name: Schedule Interviews
permissions.description: Permission to schedule and manage interview appointments

permissions.name: Access Reports
permissions.description: Permission to view and generate system reports

permissions.name: User Management
permissions.description: Permission to create, edit, and manage user accounts

permissions.name: System Administration
permissions.description: Full administrative access to system settings and configuration

permissions.name: Client Communication
permissions.description: Permission to communicate with clients and manage relationships

permissions.name: Export Data
permissions.description: Permission to export data and generate data files
